ygData.subject: Re: new uncamp places??
ygData.msgSnippet: I suggest North Ro Derv Camp next to mountain for lvl 10-15.  I earned my lvl 13, 14 and 15 there, still giving me so-so xp and good loot at lvl 15. I hunt
ygData.messageBody:
I suggest North Ro Derv Camp next to mountain for lvl 10-15. I earned my
lvl 13, 14 and 15 there, still giving me so-so xp and good loot at lvl 15.
I hunt with Ser/Einan. They team and we take turn to kill. Sometime the
place can be quite crowded and pple can just come in without any words and
start hunting themselves (ie act blur even they see we already there). For
this type of pple wiz always got the best mean to teach them a lesson -
steal their kills when they hunt monsters ard 40% dam, hehe. No joke, even
a lvl 19 warrior lost kill to me, hehehe. I guess that's the best
'ability' a wiz pocess. ;)
Once I get lvl 16, I will go camp 2 since there is more thugs spawning
there.

Above lvl 16 I dunno, still havent reach there.

I think Oasis hunting caimen and croc also not bad xp for lvl 10-15, but
the loot is pretty lousy.

So far I'm quite 'conservative' in hunting - only been to BB, G Faydark,
CB, EC, WC, Ro and Oasis. Places like Guk or L Faydark not counted coz I
go there kena killed very fast - not to mentioned any xp or loot.

Maybe it's time we go Ak'Anon for some mino hunting? Garren, Yiyang and
Leshrec can take mino knight/hero while the rest take mino slave, hehe.
Alternatively is to go back CB hunt trainer (for small shinny shield) and
derv - always wanna go back CB hunt coz I died too many times there, can't
forget the damn place, haha. If u like role-playing quest, I dun mind we
go back CB one day and do the quest for screaming mace. I think that will
be the best item currently we can give to our SOWer Trifrost and healer
Einan (must get this healer lvl up fast).

Tonight I will con't to brew for 1-2 hrs b4 going to Ro derv camp again.
Ser & Ein, join me if interested ;)

Ziltus

On Monday, June 28, 1999 10:06 AM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
wrote:

not

>

> It Najena to diff ??
> We did Runnyeyes and was slaughter every chaim.
>
> Come on lets have it. Sereph, Garren, Leshrec, we guys been around
places.
> Spill the beans or i use my new double wielding Super poison, anti magic
> Parang i just order fro me monk Guild.
>
> Yiyang
> Monk'eying nowhere
>
>
